name: LAN Party 5: Revenge of the Party Animal
name_original: LAN Party 5: Revenge of the Party Animal
description:
LAN Party 5: Revenge of the Party Animal is a simple demo game designed to test out posting games to the itch.io website.

Some Adult language

Fortuneless studios does not own the music or artwork, it is all used for a free and entertaining test game.

Enjoy!
